abstract: Forbes compiled its latest list of the world’s most powerful people, and among Wall Street executives Laurence D. Fink of BlackRock comes out on top, ahead of the chief executives of Goldman Sachs and JPMorgan Chase.
snippet: Forbes compiled its latest list of the world’s most powerful people, and among Wall Street executives Laurence D. Fink of BlackRock comes out on top, ahead of the chief executives of Goldman Sachs and JPMorgan Chase.
lead_paragraph: Update | 12:38 p.m. In Forbes’s latest list of the world’s most powerful people, some choices come as little surprise. President Obama, Hu Jintao of China and Vladimir Putin of Russia come out on top, and at No. 4 Ben S. Bernanke is confirmed as the world’s most influential central banker.

headline.main: For Forbes, Wall Street’s Most Powerful Player Is …
